MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the PA1 postcode area of Paisley, affecting properties in Queens Street and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 05:06am. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of ongoing fault investigations. Our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by Midday. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 7:39am on the 29th of January 2021
